definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (he adds, increases, v. [[יוספיה]] infr.;—on n.pr. loc. in Pal. Yšap‘ara (Egypt. form, = [[אליוסף]]) v. Mey:ZAW vi, 8 WMM:Aisen u. Europa 162)—
elder son of Jacob and Rachel;

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as an individual Ge 30:24 (name expl. v:Ge 30:23 (E) from [[אָסַף]] = take away, but v:Ge 30:24 (J) from [[יׇסַף]] add) + 155 t. Gn, chiefly in narrative of JE, also poem Ge 49:22, Ge 49:26 and, dependent on this, 1Ch 5:1, 1Ch 5:2; P only Ge 35:24, Ge 37:2 a, Ge 41:46, Ge 41:46, Ge 46:19, Ge 46:20, Ge 46:27, Ge 47:5, Ge 47:7, Ge 47:11, Ge 48:3, also Ex 1:5, Ex 1:6 ) (P), v:Ex 1:8, Ex 13:19, Jos 24:32 (all E), 1Ch 2:2, Ps 105:17. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as founder of a tribal division ´[[מַטֵּה יו]] ( = Manasseh) Nu 13:11; usu. ´[[בְּנֵי־יו]] Nu 1:32 (= Ephraim), commonly = Ephraim and Manasseh Nu 1:10, Nu 26:28, Nu 26:37, Nu 34:23, Jos 14:4, Jos 16:1, Jos 16:4, Jos 17:14, Jos 17:16, Jos 18:11, cf. Jos 24:32, 1Ch 7:29, but also of E. Jordan Israel (where half Manaeseh settled) Nu 36:1 = ´[[מַטֵּה בני יו]], v:Nu 36:5; cf. [[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט מנשׂה בֶּן־יוֹסֵף]] Nu 32:33 = cf. Nu 36:12, and Jos 17:1, Jos 17:2; ´[[בֵּית יו]] (Manasseh and Ephraim) Jos 17:17 (so orig. v:Jos 17:14 acc. to Di), Jos 18:5, Ju Jdg 1:22, Jdg 1:23; Jdg 1:25 occupying the great central region of Palestine ; 2Sa 19:21, 1Ki 11:28; ultimately =

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: the northern kingdom Am 5:6, Zec 10:6 (‖[[בֵּית יְהוּדָה]]); so [[יוֹסֵף]] alone Am 5:15, Am 6:6, De 27:12, De 33:13, De 33:16, Ob:Ob 18 (‖[[יעקב בית]]), Ez Eze 37:16, Eze 37:19, Eze 47:13, Eze 48:32; [[בְּנֵי יַעֲקׂב ויוסף]] Ps 77:16; [[אׂהֶל יוֹסֵף]] Ps 78:67 (‖[[שֵׁבֶט אֶפְרַיִם]]).
one of those who took strange wives Ezr 10:42. †
